products.description:
To start, please select in your recipes those that are considered as unprocessed products. For example, Coca Cola is a product sold as is, it is not composed of other ingredients. 

We have pre-selected for you the most common products.

preparations.description: If you use preparations common to several recipes, you can create them here. They can then be used in your recipes to simplify their creation.
